title: Problems with ocea week
body:
Lately i have enlisted in ocean week, however at the end of it, i did not receive the mystery icon and champ even tho i hv earned more than five points. I then asked my friend why, and he told me some ideas. when i signed up for the ocean week, after typing my username and passwrd, i clicked enlist now, however after enlisting, the same sign appeared again which i did not click bcoz i already did enlist.

do u hv to click that and put in ur userame and password again or is it just a technical issue that i did not receive the icon and mystery champ?

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you weren't enlisted I don't believe you could contribute points, however I may be wrong.

You can check if you pledged for ocean week by visiting the [ocean week page](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/), you should see **âœ“ You have pledged for Ocean Week!** where the enlist button was located.

The mystery champion's are still being sent out, these are being processed in batches and should be completed by the end of the week as stated in [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/LryNggNH-ocean-week-mystery-champion-update) announcement.

The icon should've been [added to your account by now](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-events/ocean-week-summoner-icon-here), the summoner icon looks like this. (You wouldn't have received notification of receiving this)
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/6.2.1/img/profileicon/1103.png

oh, in that case no, im afraid i hv not enlisted for ocean week, must hv been a bug. Bcoz i rmb typing in my username and password.

ty for your help
No problem, glad i was able to clear up the confusion.
